credit_line: Gift of Eleanor and Sarah Hewitt
title: Beaker
description: Beaker with flaring rim. Heavy channeled base surmounted by a facetted diamond-patterned band. On one side, engraved shield with letter C, floral sprays. On opposite side, a cherub drawn by two flying birds. Engraved rim with alternating group of 5 circular rounds and horizontal lozenge shape.  See also 1931-41-7-a/c.
name: Beaker
